issue.title: X2 laser scanner data not valid

content.raw:
You can try changing `gpu_ray to `ray` on [this line](#!/osrf/subt/src/e8996720182a9ac1631633f1f99ec7248323ff7f/subt_sensors/urdf/planar_lidar.urdf.xacro?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#planar_lidar.urdf.xacro-67). This will cause the the ray sensor to be CPU based instead of GPU based.

Can you also post the command you are running to launch simulation? And do have the latest code?
content.html:
You can try changing gpu_ray toray` on this line. This will cause the the ray sensor to be CPU based instead of GPU based.

Can you also post the command you are running to launch simulation? And do have the latest code?
